comments.body: The second partition discovery should re-use file statuses from the cache if the cache is not the NoOp cache

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +371,375 @@
          // reads and caches all the files initially
          assert(HiveCatalogMetrics.METRIC_FILES_DISCOVERED.getCount() == 10)

          HiveCatalogMetrics.reset()
